item.title: Please help me resolve this
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Try upgrading your video card drivers. If that doesn’t work then you will not be able to play minecraft without using modded drivers, which can be dangerous for your PC.
